Title: Krokodil Gena
Actors: Vasiliy Livanov, Klara Rumyanova, Vladimir Rautbart, Vladimir Kenigson
Plot: Cheburashka is a creature unknown to science. After the zoo rejects him, he becomes lonely and wants friends. Meanwhile, a crocodile named Gena is in the same boat and seeks friendship. The two meet and build a house for the lonely.
